info.name: Full Blade
info.description: An oversized greatsword, only the strongest will be able to wield this mighty blade.

description.p: An oversized greatsword, only the strongest will be able to wield this mighty blade.
A Small creature cannot use this weapon.
When wielded by a Medium creature, it is a Heavy, Two-Handed weapon that does 2d8 damage and imposes Disadvantage on attack rolls.
When wielded by a Large creature, it is a Heavy, Two-Handed weapon that does 2d8 damage.
